item.title:
We hope you'll join us at one of our upcoming events:
Weds 6th July, @thesocial with @ScribePedersen, Bill Drummond, @witheredhand & @eyesofothers
Thurs 7th July, @thesocial with @ScribePedersen, @holliepoetry, @DaljitNagra4 & Bill Drummond [SOLD OUT]

item.title:
RT by @tweetbytheriver: 'To move through city streets navigate by trees. Touch their bark-skin to hear through fingers how, beneath concrete roots connect.'
Read an excerpt from @JackieMorrisArt’s ‘Feather, Leaf, Bark & Stone’, published by @unbounders https://bit.ly/3ORY6OZ
item.dc:creator: @tweetbytheriver
item.description:
'To move through city streets
navigate by trees.
Touch their bark-skin
to hear through fingers how,
beneath concrete
roots connect.'

Read an excerpt from @JackieMorrisArt’s ‘Feather, Leaf, Bark & Stone’, published by @unbounders bit.ly/3ORY6OZ

item.title:
RT by @tweetbytheriver: Lush London Launch. Here live the last spattering of tickets for my journey through 𝘽𝙤𝙮 𝙁𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙣𝙙𝙨 with boy friends (all of whom feature in the book 📚 💖).
That’s 06/07 at @thesocial with Bill Drummond, Withered Hand, Eyes of Others & more. 💜🎆
https://www.caughtbytheriver.net/2022/03/caught-by-the-river-presents-boy-friends-ii/
item.dc:creator: @ScribePedersen

item.title:
RT by @tweetbytheriver: 'I had never had a relationship with a Pied Wagtail. Never even fancied one. But then I started to see this Pied Wagtail running around near Southgate Tube station...'
MY GIRL: Bill Drummond finds Muse and Matriarchal power in a little black & white bird https://bit.ly/3xVksb9
item.dc:creator: @tweetbytheriver
item.description:
'I had never had a relationship with a Pied Wagtail. Never even fancied one. But then I started to see this Pied Wagtail running around near Southgate Tube station...'

item.title:
'Ancient horns were blown, Morris dancers danced...sun salutations were offered and hope was in the air.'
@the_stone_club co-founder @apollolaan looks back on the collective’s recent British Museum event, and towards their appearance at @TheGoodLifeExp https://bit.ly/3HMWROF
item.dc:creator: @tweetbytheriver
item.description:

item.title: R to @tweetbytheriver: Also on the newsletter: @cerilevy on @sophiepavs' vibrant & vital 'Forget Me Not'; the chance to win a copy of Barry Hines' 'The Gamekeeper', courtesy @andothertweets: from the archive, @WButtress on his Glastonbury and Greenpeace-supported BEAM sculpture https://bit.ly/3OHkjPk

item.title: On the newskletter: Sue Brooks on @GeorgeMonbiot's Green Revolution; @HelenMort on @ScribePedersen's joyous, anarchic 'Boy Friends'; a Chuckle-Brothers-and-chips extract from @maximpetergriff's 'Field Notes' and some psychedelic pastoralism from @cox_tom https://bit.ly/3OHkjPk
item.dc:creator: @tweetbytheriver

item.title:
Huge congratulations to all of the writers and publishers longlisted for this year’s @wainwrightprize, announced yesterday.
You can revisit extracts from and reviews of lots of the titles — many previous Books of the Month among them — here! https://bit.ly/3ncUlYj
item.dc:creator: @tweetbytheriver
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @tweetbytheriver: 'Here is a vibrant & vital voice from the millennial generation...We have a changing of the guard and oddly, there has never been a better time to feel we are in more caring hands to protect the planet.'
@cerilevy delves into @sophiepavs' 'Forget Me Not' https://bit.ly/3OBrR6l
item.dc:creator: @tweetbytheriver

item.title: We have 3 copies of Barry Hines' 'The Gamekeeper' to give away on tomorrow's newsletter, courtesy of @andothertweets. Make sure you're signed up to our mailing list for entry details!
item.dc:creator: @tweetbytheriver
item.description: We have 3 copies of Barry Hines' 'The Gamekeeper' to give away on tomorrow's newsletter, courtesy of @andothertweets. Make sure you're signed up to our mailing list for entry details!

item.title: RT by @tweetbytheriver: Two real faves here – Mick Head & Ted Kessler - chatting in @TheNewCue1 on the top 10, grateful wasps & the album of the year. Big playlist of Head greatness too. MH & the Red Elastic Band are our Sun headliners; Ted’s here on Sat. https://thenewcue.substack.com/p/the-new-cue-174-june-20-michael-head https://thegoodlifesociety.co.uk/line-up-camp-good-life-autumn
item.dc:creator: @TheGoodLifeExp
item.description:
